name: Pirates Are BLANKing Awesome
description:
A simple arcade shooter about exploding ships for money. You play the baddie.

Get a boat, shoot stuff, collect Dubloonz, buy some schwag, defeat the boss pirate, repeat!

Meet and murder interesting people!

Features


  • Arcade shooting action
  • Upgrades (you need upgrades)
  • Deviant pirate bosses
  • 4 levels
  • Original art
  • Made by a single person
